Text: Clorox To Webcast Discussion Of FirstQuarter ResultsCLOROX TO WEBCAST DISCUSSION OF FIRSTQUARTER RESULTS OAKLAND Calif Oct The Clorox Company NYSE CLX PSE CLX will host a live audio webcast on Thursday Nov of a discussion with the investment community regarding the companys results in the fiscal first quarter ended Sept and its outlook for the second quarter of fiscal year The company will release its firstquarter results earlier that same day The webcast which can be accessed at wwwcloroxcom will begin at am PST pm EST Nov Following the live discussion a replay of the webcast will be archived for one week on the companys Web site at wwwcloroxcom Listening to the webcast requires the RealAudio plugin The Clorox Company is a billion multinational manufacturer and marketer of household products and products for institutional markets Contacts Kathryn Caulfield Media Doug Hughes Investor Relations Steve Silberblatt Investor Relations To unsubscribe click here visitorsunsubscribecfmcompanyIDCLX Service provided by Shareholdercom
